This is a testharness.js-based test.

  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: element event-dispatch intercepted error"

  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: element event-dispatch intercepted error"

  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: element event-dispatch intercepted error"
[FAIL] custombutton: Touch input should work the same as mouse input.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: element event-dispatch intercepted error"
